name: Elmalma Brand Communication
tag_list: advertising, rodin-alper-bingl, design, social-media, movie, trivia, webdesign, facebook, twitter
overview:
Since the earliest days of humanity, apples have represented knowledge. The Bible tells the story of Adam and Eve being banished from the Garden of Eden after eating an apple from the tree of knowledge, an act forbidden by God.

Elmalma’s mission is to blend the knowledge we have concerning creativity with our own experiences and opportunities..Elmalma has served many successful advertising and public relations companies for more than 10 years with its creativity and multi-disciplinary professional team from different backgrounds, it will take you beyond the limits. Additionally Elmalma has no limitations and aims to offer efficient and creative solutions to advertisers for their customers.

The definition of the medium and the consumption method in the medium has been changing. In this situation, the consumer’s mood improves and his expectations are changing with the increase in the power of technology. By having this, the consumer begins to question and to select consciously.The strategy and the creative works that have been composed by us, is constructed on the belief of exploring and developing the customers best opportunities for business success.

With this belief in mind, we compose and delevope inspired communication strategies with implemented unique and esthetic designes for you and your business. Our desire is to reach the target group and to be effective. Elmalma has fullfilled many creative corporate identities including graphic design, brand consultancy, outdoor advertising, press announcement, web design,printing press, organization with the spirit of customer service.
